content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

It sounds like you have a clear idea of what you're looking for in a bike rack, and that's great! A hitch-mounted rack with a tilting feature that's designed for carrying bikes with non-standard saddles will provide you with a safe, convenient, and easy way to transport your bike.

Remember to do your research, read reviews, and check the product specifications to ensure you find a rack that meets all your needs. Don't hesitate to reach out to the manufacturer or a local bike shop if you have any questions or concerns.

When you find the perfect rack, I'm sure you'll be excited to hit the road with your new saddle and enjoy many happy miles of cycling!

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy shopping, and I hope you find the perfect bike rack for your needs!
